item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Stay in touch — here are all the ways to contact CURIOSS: Apply to join using our JOIN form Email the organizing team at curioss-org@googlegroups.

item.title: CURIOSS Code of Conduct
item.description: Community Code of Conduct Our Pledge We as members, contributors, and leaders pledge to make participation in our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, visible or invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.
